metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for one of the Flaming Fist prison guards in the Wyrm's Rock prison that is played when the player wakes up inside the prison cell after drinking Sharess Caress' special drink. The guard talks through the bars accusing the player of carousing heavily.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_ATODO: oe command* Goto Sharess Caress in Wyrms' Crossing, talk to the Bartender. Agree to drink Potent Drink.* Drink Potent brew and drink any other alchohol at the same time.* Repeat a few times.

1.speaker: Fist Ivarus
1.text: Well look who's finally up. Heard you had a taste of Hoots' newest hooch.

0.speaker: Fist Ivarus
0.text: Bet you don't even remember half the foolery you got up to. Well, make yourself at home - you'll be staying a while.
